rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming space with open design to enhance natural light. Aligns with Vastu principles for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open-plan area ideal for socializing and relaxation, designed in a modern contemporary style.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated dining space adjacent to the living room, with ample seating and natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances and an island counter. Considered placement per Vastu for prosperity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom designed for privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Attached to the master bedroom providing convenience. Vastu guidelines encourage proper orientation.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: A separate living space with a small kitchenette and bathroom for domestic helpers, maintaining privacy while being accessible.

openings.description: Centralized door aligned with positive energy flow according to Vastu.
Provides discreet access for staff, respecting privacy and functionality.
Large window placements that ensure ample natural light, adhering to design principles for well-being.
Windows to enhance the ambiance with natural lighting.
Efficient ventilation system that aligns with Vastu's air circulation guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space on the upper level with a view, ensuring a calm environment for productivity.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom or Storage
rooms.description: Flexible room to be used as a guest bedroom or storage area. Vastu recommends clear layout.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase that ensures safe transition between levels, incorporating sufficient lighting and handrails.
Large window with an unobstructed view to inspire creativity while maintaining privacy.
